channel.title: Phone Blogs Search Video School Bush Humor Linux Design Porn Google on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: wyrd
item.description: so I am reading beowulf (or is it this). it is interesting to read for fun what I once rejected reading for school. however it really brings me back to all the discussions we had about the text. sometimes literary critique is fun. other times i hate it. i am going to get a new website. probably with these guys - maybe plan 3. I really want a terrantula. I LOVE spiders.
